properties.name: app.auth.jwks.enabled
properties.description: Set to false to skip signature verification (dev only).

properties.name: app.auth.jwks.url
properties.description: JWKS endpoint URL to fetch public/secret keys.

properties.name: app.auth.permission.url
properties.description: Endpoint to fetch user permissions from Gateway.

properties.name: app.auth.cache.type
properties.description: Type of cache: caffeine (in-memory) or redis (distributed).

properties.name: app.auth.cache.ttl
properties.description: Time-to-live for cached keys and permissions.

properties.name: app.auth.security.white-list-urls
properties.description: List of URLs that bypass authentication.
